dcterms:creator: Bryan A Plummer
Liwei Wang
Chris M Cervantes
Juan C Caicedo
Julia Hockenmaier
Svetlana Lazebnik
dcterms:description: A phrase localization dataset that extends the original Flickr30K by including region-phrase correspondence annotations, associating 31,783 images with 427K referred entities.
dcterms:title: Flickr30K Entities

dcterms:creator: Sahar Kazemzadeh
Vicente Ordonez
Mark Matten
Tamara Berg
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 130,525 referring expressions for 96,654 objects within 19,894 natural scene images, designed for referring expression comprehension.
dcterms:title: ReferItGame

dcterms:creator: Licheng Yu
Patrick Poirson
Shan Yang
Alexander C Berg
Tamara L Berg
dcterms:description: A dataset for referring expressions that includes natural language descriptions to uniquely describe objects within images, focusing on appearance-based descriptions.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO

dcterms:creator: Licheng Yu
Patrick Poirson
Shan Yang
Alexander C Berg
Tamara L Berg
dcterms:description: An extension of the RefCOCO dataset that constrains expressions to purely appearance-based descriptions, prohibiting location-based information.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO+

dcterms:creator: Junhua Mao
Jonathan Huang
Alexander Toshev
Oana Camburu
Alan L Yuille
Kevin Murphy
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes more detailed object descriptions collected in a non-interactive setting, resulting in longer average expressions.
dcterms:title: RefCOCOg
